casebody.data:
Carlos Manuel AYESTAS, aka Dennis Zelaya Corea, petitioner,
v.
Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 16-6795. Supreme Court of the United States June 5, 2017.

Motion of petitioner for appointment of counsel granted, and Lee B. Kovarsky, Esquire, of Baltimore, Maryland, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioner in this case.
